glsa.title: libgadu: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in libgadu, the worst of which may result in execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: libgadu is a library that implements the client side of the Gadu-Gadu protocol.

ul.li: X.509 certificates are not properly validated (CVE-2013-4488)
A integer overflow error could lead to a buffer overflow (CVE-2013-6487)
Malformed responses from a Gadu-Gadu file relay server are not properly handled (CVE-2014-3775)

impact.p: A remote attacker may be able to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, cause a Denial of Service condition, or spoof servers.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All libgadu users should upgrade to the latest version:
